message: Hello Bob, I'm offering this product for $14,000. I believe it will be very valuable for you.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12,500.
Thanks for your interest, Bob. I understand your perspective, but the product's value to me is quite high. How about we meet in the middle at $13,250?
I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm still a bit higher than $13,250. How about we try $12,000?
